name: Sonic (Mhost)
description:
Hello Guys , I m very happy today , I made first game today(Our very own game Sonic) and I want you guys to download it and give me your honest feedback .

Guys I 'm new into game development and this is mine first game which I have been able to produce , please your feedbacks will give me the  encouragement and confidence to continue with  my passion 

So guys download it, test it and give me your honest reactions  

Password: 123
